content: उपमेय {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} Fit to be likened or compared, comparable with; (with <ab>instr.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab>); भूयिष्ठमासीदुपमेयकांतिः गुहेन <ls>R. 6. 4</ls>; <ls n="R.">18. 34</ls>, <ls n="R. 18.">37</ls>; अंतःपुरं चैककुलोपमेयं <ls>Ku. 7. 2</ls>; <ls>Ch. P. 29</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> --यं The subject of comparison, that which is compared (<ab>opp.</ab> उपमान); उपमानोपमेयत्वं यदेकस्यैव वस्तुनः <ls>Chandr. 5. 7</ls>, <ls n="Chandr. 5.">9.</ls>
